page.title: 17MUSLIMS,HINDUS AND SIKHS
page.content: In Britain there are 2 million muslims coming mainly from Bangladesh,Pakistan and India. In Nuneaton there are 2400 muslims,250 hindus and 150 sikhs. In our area there are over 50 muslims,15 hindus and 23 sikh individuals.There is no mosque in our area but there is a large one at Frank Street which cost Â£750,000 and is also used as a religious and community centre. The old mosque was in Edward Street and was just two houses. This was used until 1984. Prayers are held five times a day, seven days a week at the mosque. On Friday a special congregational prayer is performed. In the evening 450 children attend religious instruction and study classes. The first known muslims in Nuneaton came in 1955.The sikhs do not have a temple in Nuneaton. The hindus are hoping to open a temple soon.
